description:
The instance display name is a string entered by the user, and the instance name is "instance + id" initiated by Nova. It is not easy to find the instance by the display name when the administrator maintains or locates the instance, the name should be "display name + id". Thus,  the maintenance becomes easier.

The KVM hypervisor and Havana stable branch.
The instance name in kvm is instance-00000101, and it is not easy to match with the openstack webpage display name.
title: The instance name is not associated with display name. It is not easy to maintain.
